entry.title: Hirakubozaki Lighthouse・平久保崎灯台
entry.content:
Dawn at the Hirakubozaki Lighthouse, at the northern tip of Ishigaki Island. This is a 9 panel panorama with a 120° field of view. Hirano Beach is on the right side.

石垣島の北端、平久保崎灯台の夜明け。視野角120度の9コマパノラマ。平野ビーチは右側にある。

entry.title: Ishigaki Island・石垣島
entry.content:
Sunset from the northern end of Ishigaki Island, one of the remote Yaeyama Islands at southwest end of Japan, close to Taiwan.

日本の南西端、台湾に近い八重山諸島の離島のひとつ、石垣島の北端からの夕日。

entry.title: Sogenchi Garden・曹源池庭園
entry.content:
Tenryuji temple’s famous Sogenchi Garden. I usually visit in the morning when the light comes from the east. Late in the afternoon the light comes from the west, just before dipping behind the mountains. The shadows and light are reversed.

天龍寺の有名な曹源池庭園。私がいつも訪れるのは、東から光が差し込む午前中だ。午後の遅い時間になると、光は西から差し込む。影と光が逆転する。

entry.title: Snowy Pine・雪松の木
entry.content:
A pine tree with snow, near the Togetsukyo bridge in Arashiyama.

嵐山の渡月橋近くにある雪をかぶった松の木。

entry.title: Oi River in the Snow・雪の大堰川

link.title: Oi River in the Snow・雪の大堰川

entry.content:
Another snowfall in Kyoto, perhaps the last of the season. Walking along the Oigawa river, while a boat travels to the Hoshinoya Resort around the bend.

京都にまた雪が降った。おそらく今シーズン最後だろう。大堰川沿いを歩きながら、カーブを曲がったところにある星のやリゾートに船を走らせる。
entry.summary: Another snowfall in Kyoto, perhaps the last of the season. Walking along the Oigawa river, while a boat travels to the Hoshinoya Resort around the bend.

entry.title: Ume at Seiryo-ji・清涼寺の梅花

link.title: Ume at Seiryo-ji・清涼寺の梅花

entry.content:
Ume blossoms have been late coming out this year, but they are starting to appear, such as this tree in Arashiyama's Seiryo-ji temple.

(Ume are commonly called plum blossoms in English, but are actually a relative of the apricot.)

今年は梅の開花が遅かったが、嵐山・清涼寺のこの木のように、咲き始めている。
entry.summary: Ume blossoms have been late coming out this year, but they are starting to appear, such as this tree in Arashiyama's Seiryo-ji temple. (Ume are commonly called plum blossoms in English, but are actually a relative of the apricot.)

entry.title: Arashiyama Morning・朝の嵐山
entry.content:
The sun shines while a few snowflakes continue to fall at the Togetsukyo bridge in Arashiyama.

嵐山の渡月橋で雪がちらつく中、太陽が輝いている。
entry.summary: The sun shines while a few snowflakes continue to fall at the Togetsukyo bridge in Arashiyama.
